K

keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Implementation of KeyListener.keyPressed(KeyEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of KeyListener.keyPressed(KeyEvent) function.
Calls the MoveController to move a piece with select and move or undo/reset keystrokes
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
If something is typed it controls if the text is the same of a user in the list or select what is written.
If enter is clicked, it stores the selected user and exits the LoginPage Implementation of KeyListener.keyReleased(KeyEvent) function.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Forced implementation of KeyListener.keyReleased(KeyEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Implementation of KeyListener.keyTyped(KeyEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of KeyListener.keyTyped(KeyEvent) function.
Calls the MoveController to move a piece with select and move
Klotski - Class in org.klotski.coding
Klotski class that connects LoginPage with Window passing the user.
It also implements WindowListener to catches whenever Window and LoginPage are closing.
Klotski() - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.Klotski
Klotski constructor that creates UsernameCollector that is creator for LoginPage
